title: Electronic Medical Record Management System Using Recommendation Algorithm
abstract: With the digital transformation of the world and the advancement of technology, we can improve the storage of medical records. In addition to the availability of electronic patient records, we have approached a new methodology with the help of machine learning. The project is to develop an E-Medical Record Management System which maintains patients' medical records that can be accessed from anywhere using the cloud and suggests doctors according to the patient's issues/diseases. Diseases are increasing day by day, so it is tough for physicians to manually keep up the records. Even though patients are careless which leads to taking the check-up again. So our project helps to maintain records. In addition to this, we classified the patient's records based on their required attributes and suggest doctors which are implemented using Recommendation Algorithms(Content-based filtering) under data mining concepts. This system will give an effective and efficient solution to all stakeholders.
venue: 2022 Third International Conference on Intelligent Computing Instrumentation and Control Technologies (ICICICT)

journal.name: 2022 Third International Conference on Intelligent Computing Instrumentation and Control Technologies (ICICICT)
